tasks.label: Butler Push
tasks.command: butler push --if-changed Builds/Web furkankambay/mechapod:web; butler push --if-changed Builds/Win furkankambay/mechapod:win

tasks.label: Butler Push (dry-run)
tasks.command: butler push --dry-run --if-changed Builds/Web furkankambay/mechapod:web; butler push --dry-run --if-changed Builds/Win furkankambay/mechapod:win
